divs: Sighting DetailsI went to pick up the sunday papers for delivery earlier tonight and the truck was late so i do like i usually do and look at the sky it took only a few seconds before i noticed a white light in the distant atmosphere it took a second for my eyes to ajust that far but as they did i noticed it was to lights spacing a wide dark silver rectangle shaped object i followed that till i lost sight in the backgaze of the moon...so i gave up on that and started looking around again then something caught my eye..right above me at about 300 - 400 ft there where 4 white orbs flying in a traingle formation 3 on the right in a diagonal line with the fourth in the bottom left n they made no noise yet going extremely quick i tracked them as they passed through the lil dipper constolation and quickly traveled out of sight within about 7 seconds ...in all honesty this was one the craziest things ive seen in all my years of staring at the stars
Summary: saw rectangle formation prompted by orbs in the sky
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Wilbraham
There were no other sightings in Wilbraham on or around October 11th 2009
